snippet: Recent college graduates may be coming up on their first scheduled student loan payment. Experts offer several strategies to avoid falling behind.
abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column offers questions and answers on student loan repayment.
lead_paragraph: Recent college graduates may be coming up on their first scheduled student loan payment. Experts offer several strategies to avoid falling behind.

headline.print_headline: How to Approach Student Loans, as First Payments Come Due
headline.main: How to Approach Student Loans, as First Payments Come Due
